description.value:
School necromancy [evil]; Level cleric/oracle 7, sorcerer/wizard 7;

Casting Time 1 hour
Components V, S, M (onyx gems worth 50 gp per HD of the undead to be created)

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets 1 corpse steeped in a peat bog for at least 24 hours
Duration instantaneous
Saving Throw none;  Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions as create undead (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 262), except it creates one of the following variant mummies: bog mummy, ice mummy, or Osirian tomb guardian.

target.value: 1 corpse steeped in a peat bog for at least 24 hours

materials.value: onyx gems worth 50 gp per HD of the undead to be created

data.shortDescription: This spell functions as create undead (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 262), except it creates one of the following variant mummies: bog mummy, ice mummy, or Osirian tomb guardian.
